trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were no other sightings in Los Angeles on or around August 25th 2009
divs: sighting details resembled sml white balloon floating around but changed directions several times & then went up & out of sight ! went out for a cig at work and was looking at the hills to the west of chatsworth ca. at about 11.45 am & usually watch planes or helos flying around valley. this object was seen almost directly above my position & high enough that it appeared as small balloon but its flight path was too eractic to be "just carried along w\ wind". it made several circles,then a wide circle , then went up & out of sight. i understand there have been similar sightings recently in & around this region . maybe it was a balloon, but, i have never seen one behave like that. by the way, the weather was hot & clear (with probable updraft conditions)altho not windy at 11.00 am. this region is rich in sightings from a number of poss reasons. in jan 7th, 2000 i reported (to mufon)a green object that was traveling at incredible speed from n e to s w. can only speculate how big it was. now that was a u f o. anyway, thanx for listening.
Summary: Small white light circled above, changed directions & went straight up !
